DataSourcePortable.Name: Comiss√µes
DataSourcePortable.Content:
<DataSourceDefinition> <FromSql Alias="A" SelectCommand="SELECT DOC.HANDLE, PES.NOME AGENTEVENDAS, TIPOMOVIMENTO, DATA, BASECALCULO,PERCENTUAL, VALOR, DOC.DOCUMENTO
 FROM FN_DOCUMENTOCOMISSOES DOC
 JOIN GN_PESSOAS PES ON PES.HANDLE = DOC.AGENTEVENDAS
 WHERE PARCELA IS NULL" /> <Fields> <Field Alias="HANDLE" From="A" Path="HANDLE" /> <Field Alias="AGENTEVENDAS" From="A" Path="AGENTEVENDAS" /> <Field Alias="TIPOMOVIMENTO" From="A" Path="TIPOMOVIMENTO" /> <Field Alias="DATA" From="A" Path="DATA" /> <Field Alias="BASECALCULO" From="A" Path="BASECALCULO" /> <Field Alias="PERCENTUAL" From="A" Path="PERCENTUAL" /> <Field Alias="VALOR" From="A" Path="VALOR" /> <Field Alias="DOCUMENTO" From="A" Path="DOCUMENTO" /> </Fields> </DataSourceDefinition>
